name: redeliver
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take goods, letters, parcels, etc. to people's houses or places of work again, for a second, third, etc. time: They often have to redeliver parts left off earlier deliveries because of poor organization. If there is no one to receive the parcel, we will automatically re-deliver within three to five working days.
More examplesFewer examplesI directed him to re-deliver the note to our room.Poor packaging meant that the company had to redeliver some orders up to three times.The firm has a million pound deal to pick up, clean, disinfect, and then redeliver medical instruments.
